---
category: news
title: "Decoding pig emotions with a machine learning algorithm"
excerpt: "We can now decode pigs' emotions. Using thousands of acoustic recordings gathered throughout the lives of pigs, from their births to deaths, an international team of researchers is the first in the world to translate pig grunts into actual emotions across an extended number of conditions and life stages."
